description: Documentation for 9.7.16.10.7.3. Scale Factor B ID

files.title: Overview
files.summary: The value of the scale factor `B ID` selects the sub-columns in the Tensor Memory to form the scale factor `B` matrix, which is used to scale the matrix `B`.

files.title: tcgen05-mma-scale-factor-b-layout-1x
files.summary: There is one scale factor per row of the `B` matrix with block size as 32 and the scale factor must be provided in 1-byte aligned sub-column of the Tensor Memory. *SFB\_ID* specifies the byte offset in the Tensor Memory word that must be used for the scale factor matrix. files.summary: There are two scale factors per row of the `B` matrix with block size as 32 and the scale factor must be provided in 2-byte aligned sub-column of the Tensor Memory. *SFB\_ID* specifies the half word offset in the Tensor Memory word that must be used for the scale factor matrix.
